subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the first capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की पहली राजधानी क्या थी।
explanation_en:
Jodhpur, known as Meera, was the first capital of Rajasthan when it was formed as a princely state in 1817.
